metadata.feature_description: Import and export module content for backup or migration purposes

steps.actual: Import/Export page loaded successfully showing import/export log

steps.action: Select 'My Website' from the site dropdown
steps.expected: Export Data and Import Data buttons should become enabled
steps.actual: Buttons enabled, showing Last Import and Last Export dates
Export dialog opened with all configuration options including Content toggle

steps.action: Enter export name 'HTML_Content_Export_Test' and verify Content is set to On
steps.expected: Export should be configured with content included
steps.actual: Name entered, Content toggle set to 'On', all export options visible

steps.expected: Export should be queued and success message displayed
steps.actual: Success message: 'Your data export has been placed in the queue, and will begin shortly.' Export appeared in log with 'Submitted' status

steps.expected: Import package selection dialog should appear
steps.actual: Import dialog opened showing list of available export packages with details

steps.action: Select the 'HTML_Content_Export_Test' package from the list
steps.expected: Package should be selected and highlighted
steps.actual: Package selected with blue highlight and checkmark, 'Continue' button enabled

steps.action: Click 'Continue' and wait for package validation
steps.expected: System should validate the package and show import summary
steps.actual: Package validated successfully. Import Summary displayed: 14 Users, 34 Pages, Include Content: Yes, Total Export Size: 8.7 MB

steps.expected: Import should be queued and success message displayed
steps.actual: Success message: 'Your data import has been placed in the queue, and will begin shortly.' Import appeared in log with 'Submitted' status

steps.action: Select an export package for import
steps.expected: System should automatically validate the package format
steps.actual: System displayed 'Just a moment, we are checking the package...' during validation

steps.action: Wait for package validation to complete
steps.expected: Valid packages should show import summary with all details
steps.actual: Validation completed successfully, showing detailed Import Summary with Users, Pages, Roles, Vocabularies, Include Content status, Extensions count, Assets count, and Total Export Size

observations: The Import/Export feature operates at the site level, with HTML module content included as part of the overall site content export (Include Content: Yes)
Export packages are stored in the website's App_Data/ExportImport folder as noted in the UI
Package format validation is built into the import workflow - packages are automatically validated when selected before allowing import to proceed
Both Differential and Full export modes are supported, allowing for incremental or complete site backups
The HtmlTextController.cs implements IPortable interface with ExportModule and ImportModule methods that handle the HTML content serialization to XML format with tokenized links
Export includes workflow state information through the content versioning system (published vs draft content)
The import process supports version detection and handles both legacy (< v5.1.0) and current XML formats
